collectionOfIsbns.title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
collectionOfIsbns.subTitle: A Fable About Fulfilling Your Dreams
collectionOfIsbns.author: Robin Sharma
collectionOfIsbns.description: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari is a self-help book by Robin Sharma, a writer and motivational speaker. The book is a business fable derived from Sharma's personal experiences after leaving his career as a litigation lawyer at the age of 25.

collectionOfIsbns.title: Let's Talk Money
collectionOfIsbns.subTitle: You've Worked Hard for It, Now Make It Work for You
collectionOfIsbns.author: Monika Halan
collectionOfIsbns.description: A very nice book about how to manage finances. I was very disorganised in managing my finances, but now after reading the book I am sure I will be organised. Very nicely written in a simple and easy way about the common mistakes we make in investing our money.

collectionOfIsbns.title: Understanding ECMAScript 7
collectionOfIsbns.subTitle: The Advanced Guide for JavaScript Developers
collectionOfIsbns.author: Dilip Pal
collectionOfIsbns.description: ECMAScript 7 represents the advanced and biggest update to the core of JavaScript in the history of the language.
